title: Pig Breeds Quiz
description: From pot-bellied pigs to wild boars, test your knowledge of these intelligent animals

questions.question: Which pig breed from Vietnam became a popular pet in the 1980s and 1990s due to its small size?
Which large, pink pig breed with erect ears is the most popular commercial breed in the United States?
Which pig breed has a distinctive black body with a white belt or band around its shoulders and front legs?
Which reddish-brown pig breed from the United States is known for its rapid growth and muscular build?
Which wild ancestor of domestic pigs is still found throughout Europe and Asia and has prominent tusks?
Which African wild pig has distinctive facial warts and curved tusks, and runs with its tail held straight up?
Which Japanese pig breed, known for its black coloring, produces premium pork often compared to Wagyu beef?
Which unusual pig from Indonesia has tusks that curve upward and can actually pierce its own skull?
Which heritage pig breed from England is the oldest registered pig breed in the world and has a black coat with white markings?
Which pig breed from Hungary has a distinctive curly, woolly coat similar to a sheep's fleece?
In which country are pigs traditionally used to find truffles, the valuable underground fungi?
Which friendly, small pig breed from New Zealand has a round body, short legs, and tassels (piri piri) hanging from its lower jaw?
How intelligent are pigs compared to other animals?
options: Less intelligent than most farm animals
Smarter than dogs, comparable to a 3-year-old child
About as smart as a dog
About as smart as a cat

questions.question: Which American heritage pig breed has distinctive floppy ears, spotted coat, and gets its name from a county in England?
Which Chinese pig breed is known for its extremely wrinkled face and exceptionally large litter sizes?
